paws 0.1.6

Amazon QLDB

Source: R/qldb_service.R
qldb.Rd

The control plane for Amazon QLDB

qldb(config = list())

Arguments

config

Optional configuration of credentials, endpoint, and/or region.

Service syntax

svc <- qldb(
  config = list(
    credentials = list(
      creds = list(
        access_key_id = "string",
        secret_access_key = "string",
        session_token = "string"
      ),
      profile = "string"
    ),
    endpoint = "string",
    region = "string"
  )
)

Operations

create_ledgerCreates a new ledger in your AWS account
delete_ledgerDeletes a ledger and all of its contents
describe_journal_s3_exportReturns information about a journal export job, including the ledger name, export ID, when it was created, current status, and its start and end time export parameters
describe_ledgerReturns information about a ledger, including its state and when it was created
export_journal_to_s3Exports journal contents within a date and time range from a ledger into a specified Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket
get_blockReturns a journal block object at a specified address in a ledger
get_digestReturns the digest of a ledger at the latest committed block in the journal
get_revisionReturns a revision data object for a specified document ID and block address
list_journal_s3_exportsReturns an array of journal export job descriptions for all ledgers that are associated with the current AWS account and Region
list_journal_s3_exports_for_ledgerReturns an array of journal export job descriptions for a specified ledger
list_ledgersReturns an array of ledger summaries that are associated with the current AWS account and Region
list_tags_for_resourceReturns all tags for a specified Amazon QLDB resource
tag_resourceAdds one or more tags to a specified Amazon QLDB resource
untag_resourceRemoves one or more tags from a specified Amazon QLDB resource
update_ledgerUpdates properties on a ledger

Examples

svc <- qldb()
svc$create_ledger(
  Foo = 123
)
